prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, Drums, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, Drums, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:

Style 3:
This song has Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, Drums, and Bass, but Piano is not part of it.
